object_name.value: Validate selected document is having minor version created from Periodic Review workflow

title.value: To validate if there is any minor version available which was created through Periodic Review workflow.

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
"$value(object_name)" has minor versions created through a Periodic Review workflow. You cannot send this document on another Periodic Review workflow.

dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where exists(select r_object_id from cd_controlled_doc(all) where i_chronicle_id='$value(i_chronicle_id)' and a_status != 'Effective' and r_creation_date > date('$value(r_creation_date)') and is_periodic_review_version = true)
